metadataAttributes.Title: Introduction to Software Engineering
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: If you are curious to learn more about the field of software engineering, this course is for you. No prior knowledge or qualification in programming or software development is necessary. Software Engineers are in great demand and now is a great time to learn more about this exciting career path.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Basic programming concepts,Careers in software engineering,Programming languages and frameworks,The Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC),Software Architecture,
